alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 26 at 8:41AM CDT until October 26 at 8:19PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... White Rock Creek Near White Rock Creek At Greenville Ave affecting Dallas County. Walnut Creek Near Mansfield affecting Tarrant County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...White Rock Creek near White Rock Creek At Greenville Ave. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 84.0 feet, Minor flooding will occur near the creek. Bike paths downstream of the gage will be flooded. Water approaches ball fields at Emmett Conrad High School. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 84.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 84.0 feet. - Flood stage is 84.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 81.4 feet late this morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
